channel.title: Comments on: BM College Silhouett Hooded Pullover

item.title: By: Maria
item.dc:creator: Maria
item.description: This only gets 1 star because I don't have this yet. I want it now!
item.content:encoded: This only gets 1 star because I don’t have this yet. I want it now!

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: This is the most bombastic hoodie in this shop, it's soft and has the sly BM College logo on it. Why wouldn't you buy this?
item.content:encoded: This is the most bombastic hoodie in this shop, it’s soft and has the sly BM College logo on it. Why wouldn’t you buy this?

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: I love hoodies, and cloth wear, so what could be better than a BM College hoodie? Not much, if you ask me!
item.content:encoded: I love hoodies, and cloth wear, so what could be better than a BM College hoodie? Not much, if you ask me!

item.title: By: Coen Jacobs
item.dc:creator: Coen Jacobs
item.description: I have lots of hoodies, but none is as cool as this one!
item.content:encoded: I have lots of hoodies, but none is as cool as this one!
